item.title: Intercellular communication in the brain through a dendritic nanotubular network
item.description: Intercellular nanotubular networks mediate material exchange, but their existence in neurons remains to be explored in detail. We identified long, thin dendritic filopodia forming direct dendrite–dendrite nanotubes (DNTs) in mammalian cortex. Super-...

item.title: Claude Skills are awesome, maybe a bigger deal than MCP
item.description: Anthropic this morning introduced Claude Skills, a new pattern for making new abilities available to their models: Claude can now use Skills to improve how it performs specific tasks. Skills …

item.title: Andrej Karpathy — AGI is still a decade away
item.description: "The problems are tractable, but they're still difficult”

item.title: You did no fact checking, and I must scream
item.description: I'm neither a journalist nor a professional fact checker but, the thing is, it's has never been easier to check basic facts. Yeah, sure, there's a world of misinformation out there, but it doesn't take much effort to determine if something is likely to be true. There are brilliant tools like reverse Image Search which give you a good indicator of when an image first appeared on the web, and…

item.title: The Transition of RubyGems Repository Ownership
Don't Tell My Wife! I bought ANOTHER $100K VAX on eBay!
item.description:
Follow as I take an eBay find of a VAX4000-500, restore it, configure it, set it up and install UNIX on it! You can buy the VAX on eBay: https://www.ebay.com/itm/336237047572
Free Sample of my Book on the Spectrum: https://amzn.to/3zBinWM
Check out my new merch store at: http://davesgaragemerch.com/
Check out ShopTalk, our weekly podcast, every Friday! https://www.youtube.com/@davepl
item.author: (Dave's Garage)
